name: Infestation (itch) (Adala21)
description:
Kill your way through the mass of bugs to find the portals!

All doors will need the missing key! 

Game Glitches -

Needs to be ran in full screen, not sure why or how to fix- 

Exploding flying bugs take you up with them, shoot up and down to drop, again, not sure why or how to fix this.. 

Directions -

W, A, S, D are the directional keys.

Q and Mouse Scroll change your guns. 

Mouse is directional. 

Space is jump as well as double jump. 

Make sure you pick up all the ammo, it does not auto generate!

Good luck, hope you like my first, first person shooter game!!

Please leave comments so I can continue to improve. Thank you!!
